skills.Name: Superior Summon Mastery
skills.Description: A Servitor can be summoned when summon points are 4 or lower. INT +2; When the 4 Mark Skills are used, the Servitor is linked with the ability of wrath.

skills.Name: Weapon Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Atk. by 1.5 and M. Atk. by 1.9.

skills.Name: Robe Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Def. by 1.7 when equipped with a robe.

skills.Name: Light Armor Mastery
skills.Description: When equipped with light armor, increases P. Def. by 12.5, Casting Spd. by 88%, Atk. Spd. by 25%, and MP Recovery Bonus by 20%.

skills.Name: Anti Magic
skills.Description: Increases M. Def. by 20 and Magic Damage Resistance by 5%.

skills.Name: Boost Mana
skills.Description: Increases Max MP by 30.

skills.Name: Fast Spell Casting
skills.Description: Increases Casting Spd. by 5%.

skills.Name: Spectral Rage
skills.Description: Your dealings with the Spectral Wrath allows you to summon it's wrath against the target, dealing 30 Dark Damage.

skills.Name: Mark of Trick
skills.Description: For 20 seconds, inflict damage with 8 Power added to M. Atk. Additionally, interrupt target's skill casting.

skills.Name: Transfer Pain
skills.Description: Transfers 60% of the damage received to your first summoned servitor for 10 seconds.

skills.Name: Summon Wynn Nightshade
skills.Description: Summons Wynn Nightshade. Consumes 2 summon points.

skills.Name: Mass Servitor Might
skills.Description: Increases all servitors' P. Atk. by 17% for 30 minutes.

skills.Name: Mass Servitor Shield
skills.Description: Increases all servitors' P. Def. by 15% for 30 minutes.

skills.Name: Mass Servitor Wind Walk
skills.Description: Increases all servitors' Speed by 34 for 30 minutes.

skills.Name: Mass Servitor Magic Barrier
skills.Description: Increases all servitors' M. Def. by 23% for 30 minutes.

skills.Name: Servitor Major Heal
skills.Description: Heals the servitor for $s2 of their total HP.

skills.Name: Mass Servitor Heal
skills.Description: Heal your servitors for 20% of their total HP and 50% of their total MP.

skills.Name: Anchor
skills.Description: Causes the enemy's body to go completely rigid for 5 seconds and causes paralysis for 5 seconds.

skills.Name: Recall Pet
skills.Description: Teleports your pet(s) to your location.

skills.Name: Light Armor Mastery
skills.Description: When equipped with light armor, increases P. Def. by 12.5, Casting Spd. by 88%, Atk. Spd. by 25%, and MP Recovery Bonus by 20%.

skills.Name: Weapon Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Atk. by 1.5 and M. Atk. by 1.9.

skills.Name: Robe Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Def. by 1.7 when equipped with a robe.

skills.Name: Anti Magic
skills.Description: Increases M. Def. by 20 and Magic Damage Resistance by 5%.

skills.Name: Fast HP Recovery
skills.Description: Increases HP Recovery Bonus by 1.1.

skills.Name: Fast Mana Recovery
skills.Description: Increases MP Recovery Bonus by 1.1.

skills.Name: Concentration
skills.Description: Decreases magic cancel rate by 18.

skills.Name: Spectral Rage
skills.Description: Your dealings with the Spectral Wrath allows you to summon it's wrath against the target, dealing 30 Dark Damage.

skills.Name: Mark of Trick
skills.Description: For 20 seconds, inflict damage with 8 Power added to M. Atk. Additionally, interrupt target's skill casting.

skills.Name: Mark of Plague
skills.Description: Release a disease curse on the target, dealing 12 Magical Damage per second and reducing healing by 30% for 15 seconds.

skills.Name: Mass Servitor Haste
skills.Description: Increases all servitors' Atk. Spd. by 10% for 30 minutes.

skills.Name: Anchor
skills.Description: Causes the enemy's body to go completely rigid for 5 seconds and causes paralysis for 5 seconds.

skills.Name: Summon Wynn Soulless
skills.Description: Summons Wynn Soulless. Consumes 2 summon points.
